TopicTitle: Map view not working as its suppose to

Articles.Content:
my map view button is M in ksp but when I press it doesn't work and i have to click the map view node in the bottom left of the screen and when do it just focuses on the sun and when I try to get out of map view the camera just gets stuck but everything else works fine but I can't see my ship and I have to go to the tracking station and re-run the ship from there to fix it. I can't make maneuvers can't see my ap/per height. I have These mods :
 

  • TweakScale/and its dependencies
  • Trajectories

There known issues with TweakScale, so I wonder if thats it.  My suggestion is to remove both mods and see if things work.  If that does work, install one and check and repeat.

If that doesn't work, and potentially.before you uninstall anything, try verifying your files through Steam to make sure the files aren't corrupt.
